metadata.description: Join our community of blood donors and save lives. Find blood donation campaigns, connect with donors, and respond to urgent blood requests in your area.
metadata.ogDescription: Connect with blood donors, organize donation campaigns, and help save lives. Join our growing community of blood donors across the region.
metadata.twitterDescription: Connect with blood donors, organize donation campaigns, and help save lives. Join our growing community of blood donors.
metadata.jsonLdDescription: A community platform connecting blood donors with those in need, organizing blood donation campaigns, and raising awareness about the importance of blood donation.

donation_benefits.title: Benefits of Blood Donation
donation_benefits.description: Donating blood is not only beneficial for those who receive it. Donors can also enjoy many advantages, such as:

freeHealthCheckUp.title: Free Health Check-Up
freeHealthCheckUp.description: In order to give blood, you're required to undergo a health screening. A trained staff member performs this checkup. They'll check your: pulse, blood pressure, body temperature, hemoglobin levels

improvedCardiovascularHealth.title: Improved Cardiovascular Health
improvedCardiovascularHealth.description: Donating blood can help reduce harmful iron stores. This can reduce the risk of heart disease. It can also reduce the risk of heart attack.

emotionalSatisfaction.title: Emotional Satisfaction
emotionalSatisfaction.description: Donating blood can help reduce harmful iron stores. This can reduce the risk of heart disease. It can also reduce the risk of heart attack.

reducedRiskOfCancer.title: Reduced Risk of Cancer
reducedRiskOfCancer.description: Donating blood can help reduce the risk of cancer. This is because it can reduce the risk of iron overload in the body.

ageAndWeight.title: Age and Weight
ageAndWeight.description: Donors must be between 18 and 65 years old and weigh at least 50 kg.

generalHealth.title: General Health
generalHealth.description: Be in good general health and not suffering from any diseases transmissible by blood.

donationFrequency.title: Donation Frequency
donationFrequency.description: Men can donate every three months, and women every four months.

hero_description: Blood donation is a crucial act that saves lives daily. A single donation can help up to three people and is used in various medical situations, from surgeries to cancer treatments. By donating regularly, you play a vital role in maintaining a healthy blood supply for your community.
map_title: Map of Regional Blood Transfusion Centers in Morocco!
New_Campaigns_Description: Join upcoming blood donation campaigns in your area
No active campaigns at the moment. Check back later!
confirming_description: Are you sure you want to participate in the campaign
confirming_description_2: By confirming, you agree to attend the blood donation campaign at
Blood_Requests_Description: Current blood donation requests in your area

invitation.title: Accept Invitation
invitation.invalidMessage: This invitation link is invalid or has expired.
invitation.setupMessage: You've been invited to join. Please set up your account.

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.consentMessage: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and consent to receive notifications about blood donation needs in your region. Your information will be used to match you with local donation opportunities.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.

validation.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Manage your personal information and blood donation requests

bloodRequests.noRequests: No blood requests found. Click "New Request" to create one.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete this blood request. This action cannot be undone.

how_it_works_description: tabarro3 is a platform that connects blood donors with those in need. Here's how it works:
how_it_works_step1_description: Sign up and create your profile, providing your blood group and other necessary information.
how_it_works_step2_description: If you need blood, create a request specifying the blood group, contact info, and location.
how_it_works_step3_description: The system sends notifications to matching donors in the specified area via SMS and email.
how_it_works_step4_description: If you're a matching donor, you'll receive a notification and can choose to help.
